Blackgold $0.018/$0.019. MACD in green territory. 1st break out of downtrend touched 23 and retraced to 16  weeding out most of the weaker hands & retailers. Currently Not much visible buyers at $0.018 but looks like sellers dried up. Next Monday T+4 from Tuesday spike up to touch $0.021. Got a feeling next week might come. Watchlist this one.
